sentences.en: a picture of our grandchildren
sentences.cn: 我们孙辈的一张照片

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: How do you like our schedule?
sentences.cn: 您喜欢我们的日程安排吗?。

sentences.en: It is important that we dovetail our respective interests.
sentences.cn: 让我们各自的利益相吻合很重要。

sentences.en: Most of our flights have a baggage allowance of 44lbs per passenger.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数航班行李限重为每位乘客44磅。

sentences.en: Nothing at all. And our convention?
sentences.cn: 完全没有。我们的大会？

sentences.en: Now, erm, obviously some of our listeners may have some ideas.
sentences.cn: 嗯，对了，显然我们的一些听众可能会有些想法。

sentences.en: Our cars get blocked in and we can't leave for ages.
sentences.cn: 我们的车被堵在里面，要等很久才能走。

sentences.en: Our instinctive reaction when someone causes us pain is to strike back.
sentences.cn: 当被别人弄疼时我们本能的反应是反击。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.cn: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.en: The boys were as good as gold on our walk.
sentences.cn: 我们散步的时候，这帮小男孩表现得很乖。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: The sand on the floor scrunched under our feet.
sentences.cn: 地板上的沙子在我们脚下嘎吱作响。

sentences.en: They all live in our life but far away from us.
sentences.cn: 他们都生活在我们的生活中却又离我们很远。

sentences.en: They partook of our triumph.
sentences.cn: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.en: We are constantly being reminded to cut down our fat intake.
sentences.cn: 不断有人提醒我们要减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

sentences.en: We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
sentences.cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

sentences.en: We must each take responsibility for our own actions.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都必须对自己的行为负责。

sentences.en: We must preserve our natural environment.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保护我们的自然环境。

sentences.en: We selected him as our monitor.
sentences.cn: 我们选他作我们的班长。

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

sentences.en: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
sentences.cn: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

sentences.en: You can stay at our house.
sentences.cn: 你可以住在我们家。

trans.tran_en: belonging to or connected with us
belonging to or connected with us
